item.title: Default version of QuickTree changed from 2.5-GCC-11.3.0 to 2.5-GCC-12.3.0.
Default version of QuickTree changed from 2.5-GCC-11.3.0 to 2.5-GCC-12.3.0.
Default version of pauvre changed from 0.2.3-gimkl-2020a-Python-3.8.2 to 0.2.3-gimkl-2020a-Python-3.8.2.
Default version of BamTools changed from 2.5.1-gimkl-2018b to 2.5.1-gimkl-2018b.
Default version of QUAST changed from 5.0.2-gimkl-2018b to 5.2.0-foss-2023a.
Default version of QUAST changed from 5.0.2-gimkl-2018b to 5.2.0-foss-2023a.
Default version of BEDTools changed from 2.28.0-gimkl-2018b to 2.31.1-GCC-12.3.0.
Default version of BEDTools changed from 2.28.0-gimkl-2018b to 2.31.1-GCC-12.3.0.
Default version of MultiQC changed from 1.13-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5 to 1.13-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5.
Default version of NanoPlot changed from 1.41.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5 to 1.41.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5.
Default version of TSEBRA changed from 1.1.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5 to 1.1.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5.
Default version of TSEBRA changed from 1.1.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5 to 1.1.0-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.10.5.
Default version of binutils changed from 2.27-GCCcore-6.3.0 to 2.26-GCCcore-5.4.0.
Default version of Flye changed from 2.9.3-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.11.3 to 2.9.5-foss-2023a-Python-3.11.6.
FileSender has been added.
item.description:
Send large files quickly and securely using REANNZ FileSender. https://www.reannz.co.nz/products-and-services/filesender/ This new module can be loaded with 
module load
        FileSender/2.49.0-foss-2023a

item.title: libsodium has been added.
item.description:
library for encryption, decryption, signatures, password hashing and more. https://doc.libsodium.org/ This new module can be loaded with 
module load
        libsodium/1.0.18

item.title: NextPolish2 has been added.
item.description:
a fast and efficient genome polishing tool for long-read assembly https://github.com/Nextomics/NextPolish2 This new module can be loaded with 
module load
        NextPolish2/0.2.1-foss-2023a

item.title: matlab-proxy has been added.
item.description:
Python package which enables you to launch MATLAB and access it from a web browser. https://github.com/mathworks/matlab-proxy This new module can be loaded with 
module load
        matlab-proxy/0.23.1-foss-2023a

item.title: BreakDancer has been removed.
item.description:
BreakDancer has been removed and can no longer be accessed via 
module load BreakDancer/

item.title: Dorado/0.8.3 added.
item.description:
Dorado has been updated with a new version, 0.8.3. 
module load Dorado/0.8.3/

item.title: Default version of Dorado has changed
item.description: The default version of Dorado has changed from 0.3.2 to 0.3.2, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load Dorado. If you wish to continue using 0.3.2 in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load Dorado/0.3.2

item.title: cuDNN/8.9.7.29-CUDA-12.3.0 added.
item.description:
cuDNN has been updated with a new version, 8.9.7.29-CUDA-12.3.0. 
module load cuDNN/8.9.7.29-CUDA-12.3.0/

item.title: Default version of cuDNN has changed
item.description: The default version of cuDNN has changed from 7.6.4.38-CUDA-10.1.243 to 7.6.4.38-CUDA-10.1.243, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load cuDNN. If you wish to continue using 7.6.4.38-CUDA-10.1.243 in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load cuDNN/7.6.4.38-CUDA-10.1.243

item.title: CUDA/12.3.0 added.
item.description:
CUDA has been updated with a new version, 12.3.0. 
module load CUDA/12.3.0/

item.title: Default version of CUDA has changed
item.description: The default version of CUDA has changed from 11.0.2 to 11.0.2, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load CUDA. If you wish to continue using 11.0.2 in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load CUDA/11.0.2

item.title: CRABS has been added.
item.description:
Creating Reference databases for Amplicon-Based Sequencing. https://github.com/gjeunen/reference_database_creator This new module can be loaded with 
module load CRABS/1.0.6

item.title: Default version of Eigen has changed
item.description: The default version of Eigen has changed from default to 3.3.9, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load Eigen. If you wish to continue using default in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load Eigen/default

item.title: Default version of Delft3D has changed
item.description: The default version of Delft3D has changed from default to 141732-intel-2022a, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load Delft3D. If you wish to continue using default in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load Delft3D/default

item.title: Default version of Singularity has changed
item.description: The default version of Singularity has changed from default to 3.11.3, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load Singularity. If you wish to continue using default in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load Singularity/default

item.title: Default version of LAMMPS has changed
item.description: The default version of LAMMPS has changed from default to 23Jun2022-gimkl-2022a-kokkos, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load LAMMPS. If you wish to continue using default in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load LAMMPS/default

item.title: Default version of Apptainer has changed
item.description: The default version of Apptainer has changed from default to 1.2.5, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load Apptainer. If you wish to continue using default in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load Apptainer/default

item.title: Default version of VASP has changed
item.description: The default version of VASP has changed from default to 6.4.2-intel-2022a, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load VASP. If you wish to continue using default in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load VASP/default

item.title: Default version of MATLAB has changed
item.description: The default version of MATLAB has changed from default to 2021b, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load MATLAB. If you wish to continue using default in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load MATLAB/default

item.title: Default version of ANSYS has changed
item.description: The default version of ANSYS has changed from default to 19.2, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load ANSYS. If you wish to continue using default in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load ANSYS/default

item.title: Default version of CD-HIT has changed
item.description: The default version of CD-HIT has changed from default to 4.8.1-GCC-11.3.0, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load CD-HIT. If you wish to continue using default in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load CD-HIT/default

item.title: Default version of snakemake has changed
item.description: The default version of snakemake has changed from default to 7.32.3-gimkl-2022a-Python-3.11.3, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load snakemake. If you wish to continue using default in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load snakemake/default

item.title: Default version of libpmi has changed
item.description: The default version of libpmi has changed from default to 1, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load libpmi. If you wish to continue using default in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load libpmi/default

item.title: Default version of RepeatModeler has changed
item.description: The default version of RepeatModeler has changed from default to 2.0.2a-gimkl-2020a, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load RepeatModeler. If you wish to continue using default in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load RepeatModeler/default
